name: Dundas Street
description:
Aren't you fed up of not being able to walk freely on the sidewalk? Well I am.

Here's a snippet of what it is to live on Dundas street located in  my beloved  Chinatown, 5 years of dodging slow walkers, signs and more signs.

Use the space bar to make your way through!

Enjoy!

Dundas Street was my final graduation project, it is my first game, I'am not a game developper so it was a great experience and would like to do more of it.
